page.title: 09WHATTON DETENTION CENTRE
page.content: Most of the boys at the detention centre are there for taking and driving away cars, playing truant and mugging old people.The age range is from 14 to 21 years. When they first get there they sleep in small rooms. Later they sleep in dormitories of 20 boys. In the mornings the boys work, learning a skill or just doing menial tasks. Then in the afternoon the boys can chose what lesson they want to do like learning to play the guitar and trade work like brick laying and wood work. The only entertainment they get is television and a Sunday night video. The boys think the food is terrible partly because they have to eat out of tin trays.Only the new younger ones try to escape.They do all sorts of sports and their education is just like that of a normal school.
